effect:
This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect.

This ability does not stack with a held item.

Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.
flavor_text:
By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon
may cause the target to flinch.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.

effect: The weather.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.

It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO

If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

short_effect: Prevents paralysis.

During a sandstorm.

effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed Pokémon, if applicable.

This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy).

short_effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3×.

effect: This Pokémon cannot be asleep in battle.
flavor_text:
The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot
fall asleep.

effect:
Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move, the Pokémon's type changes to match the move.

If the Pokémon has two types, both are overridden.  The Pokémon must directly take damage; for example, moves blocked by a .

This ability takes effect on only the last hit of a multiple-hit attack.

In Pokémon Colosseum and XD: Gale of Darkness, this ability does not take effect on Shadow-type moves.
flavor_text:
The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move
used on it.
short_effect: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.

effect:
This Pokémon cannot be poisoned.  This includes bad poison.

If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
flavor_text:
The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from
getting poisoned.
short_effect: Prevents poison.

effect: This Pokémon is immune to .
flavor_text:
Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit
by one.
short_effect: Protects against  moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

effect:
This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment rate.
flavor_text:
This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of
attacks taken.
short_effect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.

effect:
This Pokémon cannot be confused.

If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
flavor_text:
This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents
it from becoming confused.
short_effect: Prevents confusion.

effect:
This Pokémon cannot be forced out of battle by moves such as  still inflict damage against this Pokémon.

effect:

effect:

This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s

effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP.

This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin

effect:
Whenever this Pokémon is burned.

effect:
Moves targetting this Pokémon use one extra PP.

This ability stacks if multiple targets have it.  This ability still affects moves that fail or miss.  This ability does not affect ally moves that target either the entire field or just its side, nor this Pokémon's self-targetted moves; it does, however, affect single-targetted ally moves aimed at this Pokémon, ally moves that target all other Pokémon, and opponents' moves that target the entire field.  If this ability raises a move's PP cost above its remaining PP, it will use all remaining PP.

When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.
flavor_text:
By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it
raises their PP usage.
short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

short_effect: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective, or a one-hit KO move.

effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals the move with the highest base power known by any opposing Pokémon to all participating trainers.

In the event of a tie, one is chosen at random.

Moves without a listed base power are assigned one as follows:

Power | Moves
----: | -----
  160 | One-hit KO moves: 
    0 | Any such move not listed
flavor_text:
When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of
the moves an opposing Pokémon has.
short_effect: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

effect: This Pokémon ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers, its stat modifiers affect damage as usual.
flavor_text:
When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target
Pokémon’s stat changes.
short_effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.

effect: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
flavor_text:
The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves
to deal regular damage.
short_effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

effect: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective.
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
short_effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

effect:
This Pokémon's Attack are halved for five turns upon entering battle.

This ability also takes effect when acquired during battle.  If this Pokémon loses its ability before the five turns are up, its Attack and Speed return to normal; if it then regains this ability without leaving battle, its Attack and Speed are halved again, but the counter keeps counting from where it was.
flavor_text:
For five turns, the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed
stats are halved.
short_effect: Halves Attack for five turns upon entering battle.

effect:
This Pokémon ignores -type moves.

Ghost Pokémon's other types affect damage as usual.
flavor_text:
The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with
Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
short_effect: Lets the Pokémon's  Pokémon.

effect: All other Pokémon's single-target  takes precedence over this ability.
flavor_text:
Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit 
by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
short_effect: Redirects single-target .

effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.
flavor_text: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
short_effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

effect: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective.
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
short_effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

effect: The weather.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.
flavor_text:
The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters
a battle.
short_effect: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

effect:
This Pokémon has a chance of picking up  after each battle.  This chance starts at 5% and rises another 5% after every tenth level: 5% from level 1–10, 10% from 11–20, and so on, up to 50% from 91–100.

This ability is checked after the battle ends, at which point any temporary ability changes have worn off.
flavor_text: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.
short_effect: The Pokémon may pick up  after battle.

effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.

In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
flavor_text:
When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an
opposing Pokémon’s held item.
short_effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

effect:
This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power.

.
flavor_text: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
short_effect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.

effect:
If this Pokémon is holding an elemental Plate, its type and form change to match the Plate.

This Pokémon's held item, whether or not it is a Plate, cannot be taken by -type form.  If the Transforming Pokémon is holding a Plate, this ability will then activate and change the Pokémon into the corresponding form.
flavor_text:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the Plate or
Z-Crystal it holds.
short_effect: Changes 's type and form to match its held Plate.

effect: Friendly Pokémon have 1.5× their Attack will switch between its forms even if it loses this ability.  As such, this ability also works if obtained by a Pokémon other than Cherrim.
flavor_text:
Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself
and allies when it is sunny.
short_effect: Increases friendly Pokémon's Attack.

effect: Opposing Pokémon take 1/8 of their maximum HP.
flavor_text: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
short_effect: Damages sleeping after each turn.

effect:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, if it does not have a held item, it steals the attacker's held item.

This Pokémon cannot steal upon being knocked out.  It can steal if the attacker has a , but cannot steal when its own Substitute is hit.  If a move hits multiple times, only the last hit triggers this ability.  If this Pokémon is wild, it cannot steal from a trained Pokémon.
flavor_text:
Steals an item from an attacker that made
direct contact.
short_effect: Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.

effect:
This Pokémon's moves with extra effects have 1.3× their power, but lose their extra effects.

An effect chance is a move's chance to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect. For example,  rate.

Moves that lower the user's stats are unaffected.
flavor_text:
Removes additional effects to increase the power
of moves when attacking.
short_effect: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.

effect: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
flavor_text: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
short_effect: Inverts stat changes.

effect:
Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle.

Affected Pokémon can still use  to eat a target's Berry.
flavor_text:
Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable
to eat Berries.
short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

effect:
When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered rises by two stages.

If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.
flavor_text:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its
stats are lowered.
short_effect: Raises Attack upon having any stat lowered.

effect: This Pokémon's Attack or less.
flavor_text:
Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats
when its HP becomes half or less.
short_effect: Halves Attack or less.

effect: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
flavor_text: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

effect: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any major status ailment after each turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.

effect:
All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle.

This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.
flavor_text: Reduces damage done to allies.
short_effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.

effect:
Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed falls one stage.

This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
flavor_text:
Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense
stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
short_effect: Raises Speed by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

effect: This Pokémon has double the usual weight for its species.
flavor_text: Doubles the Pokémon’s weight.
short_effect: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

effect: This Pokémon has half the usual weight for its species.
flavor_text: Halves the Pokémon’s weight.
short_effect: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

effect: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.
flavor_text:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes
when its HP is full.
short_effect: Halves damage taken from full HP.

effect: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Attack.
flavor_text:
Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon
is poisoned.

effect: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack.
flavor_text:
Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon
is burned.

effect: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during strong sunlight.
flavor_text: May create another Berry after one is used.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.

effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
flavor_text: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
short_effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

effect:
After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage.

If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
flavor_text:
Raises one stat sharply and lowers another
every turn.
short_effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
flavor_text:
Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail,
and powder.
short_effect: Protects against damage from weather.

effect: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning.
flavor_text:
May poison a target when the Pokémon
makes contact.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.

effect:
This Pokémon regains 1/3 of its maximum HP when it is switched out for another Pokémon under any circumstances other than having fainted.

This ability does not take effect when a battle ends.
flavor_text: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
short_effect: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.

effect: This Pokémon's Defense.
flavor_text:
Protects the Pokémon from
Defense-lowering effects.

effect: This Pokémon's Speed, and it does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.

effect: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn.

 are unaffected.

Other damage, e.g. from weather.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes heavy rain.  Heavy rain has all the properties of  will prevent the effects of heavy rain, including allowing Fire moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
flavor_text:
The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify
Fire-type attacks.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes extremely harsh sunlight.  Extremely harsh sunlight has all the properties of  will prevent the effects of extremely harsh sunlight, including allowing Water moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
flavor_text:
The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify
Water-type attacks.

A mysterious air current causes moves to not be super effective against Flying; they do neutral damage instead.   will prevent the effect of a mysterious air current, but will not allow the weather to be changed.

The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP
becomes half or less.

effect: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.

The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its
HP becomes half or less.

effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle and at the end of each turn, if its HP is 50% or above, it changes into Meteor Form; otherwise, it changes into Core Form.  In Meteor Form, it cannot be given a major status ailment (though existing ones are not cured), cannot become drowsy from  (which will simply fail).

This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Minior.
flavor_text:
When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s
shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.
short_effect: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.

effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
flavor_text:
Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s
replacement if the target switches out.
short_effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

effect: When this Pokémon is hit by a Fire move, the damage is halved.  When this Pokémon uses a Water move, the power is doubled.  This Pokémon cannot be burned, and if it becomes burned, the  burn is immediately ured.
flavor_text:
Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the
Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting
a burn.
short_effect: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.

effect: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.
flavor_text: Powers up Steel-type moves.

effect: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move that causes its HP to drop below 50%, its Special Attack rises by one stage.

hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

effect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.

effect: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

effect:

powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP

Once per battle, the shroud that covers the
Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes
half or less. Then the Pokémon changes
its form to Complete Forme.

effect: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.

The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s
a Steel or Poison type.

effect: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.  It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by ; and so on.
flavor_text:
It’s always drowsing and will never wake up.
It can attack without waking up.
short_effect: This Pokémon always  acts as though it were Asleep.

effect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.
short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
flavor_text:
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit
by the amount equal to its last HP.
short_effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

effect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
flavor_text:
When another Pokémon uses a dance move,
it can use a dance move following it regardless
of its Speed.
short_effect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

effect: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.
flavor_text: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.
short_effect: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.

effect: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
flavor_text:
Halves the damage taken from moves that make
direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
short_effect: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

effect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
flavor_text:
Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.
short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

effect: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.
flavor_text: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.
short_effect: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.

effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
flavor_text:
Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.
short_effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
short_effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
short_effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

effect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
flavor_text:
The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each
time it knocks out a Pokémon.
short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.

effect:
Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Silvally.
flavor_text:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the
memory disc it holds.
short_effect: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to .
flavor_text:
Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the
Pokémon enters a battle.
short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to .
flavor_text:
Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.
short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to .
flavor_text:
Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.
short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to .
flavor_text:
Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.
short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.

effect: This Pokémon's stats cannot be lowered by other Pokémon's moves or abilities.  This effect only applies to normal stat modifications and not more exotic effects such as .
flavor_text:
Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokémon’s stats.
short_effect: Other Pokémon cannot lower this Pokémon's stats.

effect:
When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage (not fixed damage!) from moves is halved.

This ability cannot be nullified.
flavor_text:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes
while its HP is full.
short_effect: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.

effect:
Super-effective damage this Pokémon takes is reduced to 0.75×.

This Ability is not bypassed by .
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
short_effect: Reduces super-effective damage to 0.75×.
